alert.note: Alert for Perry; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 3:56PM CDT until October 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERRY...NORTH CENTRAL GARLAND...NORTHWESTERN SALINE AND EASTERN YELL COUNTIES... At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Plainview in Yell County, or 15 miles southeast of Danville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hollis... Garden Point Recreation Area... Fourche Junction... HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
